title: New Deal and Great Society comparison

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE similarity between New Deal and Great Society programs. Briefly describe ONE difference between New Deal and Great Society programs. Briefly explain ONE reason for a difference between New Deal and Great Society programs.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE similarity between New Deal and Great Society programs. Briefly describe ONE difference between New Deal and Great Society programs. Briefly explain ONE reason for a difference between New Deal and Great Society programs.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
